vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H2540', 'matchingForm': 'חַמּוֹן', 'stepTransliteration': 'cham.mon', 'gloss': 'Hammon', '_searchResultRange': 'Josh.19.28-1Chr.6.76', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '哈們', '_es_Gloss': 'Hammón', '_zh_Gloss': '哈们'}, {'strongNumber': 'H2575B', 'matchingForm': 'חַמַּת', 'stepTransliteration': 'cham.mat', 'gloss': 'Hammath', '_searchResultRange': '1Ch.2.55', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '哈末', '_es_Gloss': 'Hamath', '_zh_Gloss': '哈末'}, {'strongNumber': 'H2576', 'matchingForm': 'חַמֹּת דֹּאר', 'stepTransliteration': 'cham.mot dor', 'gloss': 'Hammoth-dor', '_searchResultRange': 'Josh.21.32@Josh.19.28-1Chr.6.76', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '哈末多珥', '_es_Gloss': 'dor', '_zh_Gloss': '哈末多珥'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Hammath = "hot spring"
one of the fortified cities in the territory allotted to Naphtali
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad fortificada; territorio de Neftalí; (b)   ancestro de los quenitas
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈末 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "溫泉"
在分配給拿弗他利領土內的要城之一 #書 19:35|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈末 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "温泉"
在分配给拿弗他利领土内的要城之一 #书 19:35|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.55;
father of: Rechab (H7394H)
§ Hammath = "hot spring"
father of the house of Rechab
